name: UserBenchmark Dark (Compare)
description: A simple dark skin for UserBenchmark. Note that only Compare page works properly, the rest can look awkward.
additional_info: Considering the website uses lots of style inside HTML rather than clean HTML+CSS, I don't have any plans working on other parts of the website than just Compare (which works well on May 4, 2019). If you want to start off from this style, feel free to do so without giving me credit.

discussions.name: Fix black text on middle column
